heading: Application for permit
text:
All applications for permits shall be submitted on forms furnished by the department.
Applications shall include all information required by this code, other applicable law or the rules of the department. The ap plicant
shall list any portions of the design that have been approved for deferred submittal in accordance with section 28 -104.2.6. The
application shall set forth an inspection program for the project. An application for a permit shall be submitted no later than 12
months after the approval of all required construction documents (other than those documents approved for deferred submittal).
